Description: Murine Fc gamma receptors (Fc?Rs) in preclinical models pose significant challenges in the evaluation of antibody-based therapies, often leading to misleading outcomes that impede drug development. FcResolv™ NOG mice, designed with targeted knockout of these receptors, improve the accuracy of antibody-based drug studies by eliminating significant confounding variables, providing clearer, more translatable results. Learn how super immunodeficient and humanized immune system (HIS) FcResolv™ NOG models eliminate false negatives and positives that occur when an antibody-based therapeutic's Fc domain interacts with murine Fc?Rs. The new FcResolv™ huNOG-EXL extends utility of this portfolio as a HIS mouse with human myeloids and lymphoids.
Location: Spotlight Theater D - Sails Pavilion - Conv Ctr
